description: One month in office and the new Irish prime minister has already faced major challenges.
title: Miche¨¢l Martin's first month as taoiseach
title_page: Miche¨¢l Martin's first month as taoiseach - BBC News
maintext: With no cabinet minister with a departmental portfolio from as far south as Limerick on the west coast, to Donegal in the north, there were over-the-top cries that he had abandoned the west and was treating it like Oliver Cromwell, who is infamous in the Republic of Ireland and regarded by many as a mass murderer.
